articles.title: Revised 2024 F1 Monaco Grand Prix starting grid as Haas disqualified - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: Check out the starting grid for the 2024 F1 Monaco Grand Prix.
articles.content:
Haas's double disqualification from Monaco Grand Prix qualifying has bumped Sergio Perez up to 16th on the grid. 
Both Nico Hulkenberg and Kevin Magnussen were removed from the qualifying classifica… [+404 chars]
